entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 30 January 2023
